# dotfiles
Personal configuration files managed by [yadm](https://yadm.io/#).

## Quick start
### 1. Get yadm
Install from repository.
```sh
# archlinux
sudo pacman -S yadm
```
### 2. Clone repo
Get files in place.
```sh
yadm clone git@github.com:ChuJiani/dotfiles.git
```
### 3. Yadm bootstrap 
Get necessary packages.
```sh
yadm bootstrap  # execute ~/.config/yadm/bootsrap
```
